TopicTitle: New (Unwanted) fuel types for Nuke Engines. How to remove?

Articles.Content:
PICTURES HERE:

https://imgur.com/a/8vkUA1D

Hello. I'm not sure if i've installed some oddmod or whether KSP updated nuke engine info but look at the attached photo of the nuke engine? there's so much useless info i don't need to see, i can also switch fuel types and can fill them with things such as actinides, enriched uranium, plutonium-238 etc ... never heard of this before?

Does anyone know what's going on? can i simplify the info? there's also another issue since i cannot use them in space, they don't fire, i've done all the checks and liquid fuel tanks are in the same stage but they won't turn on. any guesses?

Thanks,
Nick

Looks like most of those fields are coming from KSP Interstellar Extended.

https://github.com/sswelm/KSP-Interstellar-Extended/blob/master/FNPlugin/Propulsion/ThermalNozzleController.cs
thank you for the reply, will remove mod, reload and check again

Thanks! that's part of my problem solved, much appreciated.

 

Do you know what these 2 fuel sources are?   https://imgur.com/a/vPwXuhw

Are these another mod? i suspect they will still render my nuke engine inoperable since they are empty, haven't seen these before?

Those seem to be defined in Community Resource Pack.

https://github.com/BobPalmer/CommunityResourcePack/blob/master/FOR_RELEASE/GameData/CommunityResourcePack/CommonResources.cfg
